attributes.action: refuse scottish mps to vote in the commons on issues affecting england and wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if scotland want independence why should they be allowed to vote on  issues affecting the english and welsh population, this seems irrelevent.Why not invite some french and thai mps to cast thier vote also ? voting always should be representative of the will of the people scottish mps are not english people they have there own parliment ( which we subsidised the building of )let them play god in there own country not ours !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
